author: wn.com
title: Banned religious group threatens female journalists in Bangladesh (IFJ - International Federation of Journalists)
text: ( Source : IFJ - International Federation of Journalists ) The International Federation of Journalists (IFJ) deplores the recent threat issued by the religious group, Ansarullah Bangla Team ( ABT ), against female journalists in Bangladesh . The
